name: Barking Irons
description:
Your goal is to stay alive in a duel - any way you can. Discover all 4 ways of winning the game - including breaking the rules!

CONTROLS:

WASD/Arrow keys - move
LMB/Space - hit/shoot revolver (Mouse - aim)
Escape - pause

Credits

John Ivess - game design, programming
Kenney - art
Swngyill YOON - battle music theme (City of Backstreet)

Developed in 7 days for AI and Games Jam 2021 (theme: 'BREAKING THE RULES')
